LanguageData.PublisherPlus.Settings.GitIgnore.Tooltip: If the mod directory contains a .gitignore file, it will be used to filter files/ folders before uploading to the workshop (items matched by the ignore file will not be listed in the mod contents dialogue prior to upload).
